page.title: 11Education
page.content: Within our local area there are three{ {primary}schools located at Kexbrough, Darton and Barugh Green.Pupils attend the primary schools from the age of four to eleven.Then they are transferred to Darton High School which is a{comprehensive.}This is one of the largest schools in the Barnsley area with 1,276 pupils and an additional 118 sixth form students but numbers will drop due to falling roles. It is a split-site school with years one and two in Darton village, and the rest located at Kexbrough.At the moment we have a lack of{nursery school provision in the area and this has lead to the setting up of a privately run playgroup for 3 to 5 year olds in Darton.All the above schools are used for adult education evening courses run by the local authority.
